cause.description:
A three day walk in Philadelphia in October for the fight against breast cancer. We will be walking 20 miles each day for a total of 60 miles to raise money for breast cancer. Each participant must raise $2,200. Donate to breast cancer and my walk at http://www.the3day.org/philadelphia07/devyne. Thanks!
1. Help raise money to find a cure for breast cancer.
2. "Because everyone deserves a lifetime."
cause.name: Breast Cancer 3 Day
